description: Working and delivering a wide range of projects, using the latest technologies and ensuring the best practices through all the process. Also giving support through Amazon Web Services and creating APIs with Serverless and AWS Lambda.

In charge of developing a new platform for the UK TV Broadcasters and Advertisement Media Outlets, implementing a modern front end setup, and designing and maintaining a comprehensive style guide for the project.

Developed and supported the main website with special focus in the checkout user journey using high standards of performance, responsiveness and accessibility. Created several internal tools to improve the efficiency of other departmentsâ€™ workflows. Additionally I was responsible for the development of the email templates.
Developed and supported legacy Wordpress theme designs. Worked alongside the design team to create mockups and implement them afterwards.
Developed and supported the main web application alongside the front end team, focusing on the overall design and paying special attention to the responsive design for mobile devices.
